statements: SELECT * FROM public_health_data ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM public_health_data WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM public_health_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, record_date FROM public_health_data ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS count_of_cases FROM public_health_data GROUP BY disease_name;
SELECT * FROM public_health_data WHERE disease_name = 'Flu' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM public_health_data WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT id, patient_name FROM public_health_data WHERE disease_name LIKE '%pox%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT MAX(record_date) AS latest_record_date FROM public_health_data
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM public_health_data
SELECT * FROM public_health_data WHERE disease_name = 'Flu';
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM public_health_data ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM public_health_data GROUP BY disease_name;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM public_health_data WHERE date_reported > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_administered FROM public_health_data JOIN disease_control_records ON public_health_data.id = disease_control_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM public_health_data WHERE date_reported = '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM disease_control_records WHERE treatment_administered = 'Antibiotics' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM public_health_data WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19' AND date_reported > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM disease_control_records;

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, treatment_administered FROM public_health_data JOIN disease_control_records ON public_health_data.id = disease_control_records.patient_id WHERE date_reported > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Disease_Recordings WHERE recording_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT disease_name, location, recording_date FROM Disease_Recordings WHERE location='Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM Patient_Details WHERE age > 50;
SELECT official_name, department FROM Health_Officials WHERE location_assigned='City Center';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patient_Details WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Disease_Recordings WHERE recording_date = '2021-10-15'
SELECT recording_id, disease_name, location FROM Disease_Recordings WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY recording_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patient_Details WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT official_name, location_assigned FROM Health_Officials WHERE department = 'Public Health' AND contact_email LIKE '%@healthdept.com'
SELECT patient_name, gender, contact_number FROM Patient_Details WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients;
SELECT gender, address FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM screenings WHERE result = 'positive';
SELECT patient_id, date FROM screenings ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT patients.name, screenings.date, screenings.result FROM patients JOIN screenings ON patients.patient_id = screenings.patient_id WHERE screenings.result='Positive'

SELECT diseases.name, diseases.description, COUNT(screenings.result) AS num_cases FROM diseases LEFT JOIN screenings ON diseases.disease_id = screenings.screening_id GROUP BY diseases.name ORDER BY num_cases DESC
SELECT * FROM public_health_agencies
SELECT agency_name, location FROM public_health_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC
SELECT * FROM diseases WHERE symptoms IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT disease_name, symptoms FROM diseases WHERE disease_id = 1
SELECT * FROM public_health_agencies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM health_records JOIN diseases ON health_records.disease_id = diseases.disease_id GROUP BY disease_name ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' AND age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records hr JOIN patients p ON hr.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.location='California' AND hr.status='Active';

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, record_date FROM patients p JOIN health_records hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id JOIN diseases d ON hr.disease_id = d.disease_id WHERE hr.record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
